resources.name: Claude Code Flow
resources.description: This mode serves as a code-first orchestration layer, enabling Claude to write, edit, test, and optimize code autonomously across recursive agent cycles.
resources.author: ruvnet

resources.name: Claude Squad
resources.description: Claude Squad is a terminal app that manages multiple Claude Code, Codex (and other local agents including Aider) in separate workspaces, allowing you to work on multiple tasks simultaneously.
resources.author: smtg-ai

resources.name: Claude Swarm
resources.description: Launch Claude Code session that is connected to a swarm of Claude Code Agents.
resources.author: parruda

resources.name: Claude Task Master
resources.description: A task management system for AI-driven development with Claude, designed to work seamlessly with Cursor AI.
resources.author: eyaltoledano

resources.name: Happy Coder
resources.description: Spawn and control multiple Claude Codes in parallel from your phone or desktop. Happy Coder runs Claude Code on your hardware, sends push notifications when Claude needs more input or permission, and costs nothing.
resources.author: GrocerPublishAgent

resources.name: The Agentic Startup
resources.description: Yet Another Claude Orchestrator - a collection of agents, commands, etc., for shipping production code - but I like this because it's comprehensive, well-written, and one of the few resources that actually uses Output Styles! +10 points!
resources.author: Rudolf Schmidt

resources.name: TSK - AI Agent Task Manager and Sandbox
resources.description: A Rust CLI tool that lets you delegate development tasks to AI agents running in sandboxed Docker environments. Multiple agents work in parallel, returning git branches for human review.
resources.author: dtormoen
